page.title: 17HOME LIFE
page.content: Father mother Paul age 14,Jonathan age 11.Sunday,16th June,1985.A lie-in from our weekday 7.15am start,until church bells wake us at 9.00am.Breakfast of cereals and toast.Pet rabbit fed by Jonathan.Father's Day today, so presents and cards given.Paul does homework,Jonathan plays with friends, father does gardening and mother goes to Family Service at church.Snack lunch then father and Paul go to cricket ground to get pitch ready for under-16 match.In winter it is the turn of football.Spend afternoon at cricket; mother and Jonathan watch, father umpires and Paul plays.Copman- thorpe lose.Then home for evening dinner of roast beef and Yorkshire Pudding with strawberries and cream to follow,a bottle of wine and coffee. Sunday paper read by all.After watch- ing TV it's early to bed.
